languages.text: Если персонаж находится в зоне видимости другого персонажа, то в него можно выстрелить или использовать на нем {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}. Наличие зоны видимости отображается линей, идущей к персонажу.

Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks against them or use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on them. This line of sight is displayed as a line to a character.
languages.original_text: Если персонаж находится в зоне видимости другого персонажа, то в него можно выстрелить или использовать на нем {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}. Наличие зоны видимости отображается линей, идущей к персонажу.

traits.locale_text: Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make ranged attacks against them or use abilities on them. This line of sight is displayed as a green line to a character.
Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make ranged attacks against them or use abilities on them. This line of sight is displayed as a green line to a character.
Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make ranged attacks against them or use abilities on them. This line of sight is displayed as a green line to a character.

Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks against them or use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on them. This line of sight is displayed as a line to a character.

Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks against them or use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on them. This line of sight is displayed as a line to a character.

languages.text: Hast du eine Sichtlinie zu einem Charakter, können andere Charaktere {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g} gegen ihn durchführen oder {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} auf ihn anwenden. Diese Sichtlinie wird als Linie zu einem Charakter angezeigt.
languages.original_text: Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks against them or use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on them. This line of sight is displayed as a line to a character.

traits.locale_text: Wenn du eine Sichtlinie zu einem Charakter hast, können andere Charaktere Fernkampfangriffe gegen ihn durchführen oder Fähigkeiten auf ihn anwenden. Diese Sichtlinie wird als grüne Linie zu einem Charakter angezeigt.

Hast du eine Sichtlinie zu einem Charakter, können andere Charaktere {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriffe gegen ihn durchführen oder {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} auf ihn anwenden. Diese Sichtlinie wird als Linie zu einem Charakter angezeigt.

languages.text: Avoir une cible en ligne de mire permet à d'autres personnages de l'attaquer {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} ou d'utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} sur elle. Une ligne menant à la cible représente cette ligne de mire.
languages.original_text: Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks against them or use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on them. This line of sight is displayed as a line to a character.

traits.locale_text: Avoir une cible en ligne de mire permet à d'autres personnages de mener des attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} contre elle ou d'utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} sur elle. Une ligne menant à la cible représente cette ligne de mire.

languages.text: 当角色的视线范围中有其他角色时，该角色可以对视线中的角色进行{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远{/g}程攻击，或者对其使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。视线会以直线进行显示。
languages.original_text: Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks against them or use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on them. This line of sight is displayed as a line to a character.

traits.locale_text: 当角色的视线范围中有其他角色时，该角色可以对视线中的角色进行{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远{/g}程攻击，或者对其使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。视线会以直线进行显示。

languages.text: Tener línea de visión a un personaje permite que otro personaje lance ataques a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} contra él. La línea de visión se muestra como una línea que va hasta el personaje.
languages.original_text: Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks against them or use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on them. This line of sight is displayed as a line to a character.

traits.locale_text: Tener línea de visión a un personaje permite que otro personaje lance ataques a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} contra él. La línea de visión se muestra como una línea que va hasta el personaje.

languages.original_text: If a character is in the line of sight of another character, you can shoot at him or use an ability on him. The presence of a line of sight is indicated by a green line going to the character.

languages.text: あるキャラクターへの見通し線を保つことで、他のキャラクター達がそのキャラクターに対して{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃を行なったり、そのキャラクターに対して{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用したりすることが可能となる。この見通し線は、キャラクターに向かう線で表示される。
languages.original_text: Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks against them or use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on them. This line of sight is displayed as a line to a character.

traits.locale_text: あるキャラクターへの見通し線を保つことで、他のキャラクター達がそのキャラクターに対して{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃を行なったり、そのキャラクターに対して{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用したりすることが可能となる。この見通し線は、キャラクターに向かう線で表示される。

languages.text: Bir karakter diğerlerinin görüş hattındaysa diğer karakterler ona {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} saldırı yapabilir veya onun üzerinde {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullanabilir. Görüş hattı, karaktere doğru ilerleyen bir çizgi ile gösterilir.
languages.original_text: Having a line of sight to a character lets other characters make {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks against them or use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on them. This line of sight is displayed as a line to a character.
